title: Shame on you guys
body:
I would be shocked if Riot releases item ideas before they go out onto PBE ever again.

You say you want more interaction with Riot? Well act like it.

They showed you items they were thinking about putting onto the PBE for testing and instead of having a discussion on the items all anyone wants to do is shit on them and bitch about how weak they are going to make mages.

Remember this next time you complain that rito doesn't interact with the community enough.

replies.body: Well these items dont even look that fun. just dumb and/or confusing
There is a way to say while having a discussion instead of just saying "These items fucking suck they are screwing up mages forever"

> I would be shocked if Riot releases item ideas before they go out onto PBE ever again.

We are adults.. Some of us are vulgar (me), others know to to beat around the bushes with nice words. Core of our fears is the same. And believe it or not even the most trashy talk is still a good way of checking if players are in favour or against changes.

So far ALOT of players dislike it.

> They showed you items they were thinking about putting onto the PBE for testing and instead of having a discussion on the items all anyone wants to do is shit on them and bitch about how weak they are going to make mages.

Yeah, we DID reacted too harsh, but for discussion both sides have to participate.
All we get is CertainlyT-level bullshit where they don't talk with us, but explain us over and over that those changes are set in stone and we can whine and cry with no changes.

If everyone on the forms can instantly see that these items and changes will hurt the class that they were intended to help. Then it's Riot's R&D team that didn't see the obvious implications such an item/change will do.

I have seen mixed support for these changes (and they're changes so people will always dislike it). In all honesty, people are making too many assumptions as though they can even pretend to comprehend how it affects the game with the champion updates as well. We wanted interaction, and unfortunately not all of it will be good experiences but that doesn't mean it isn't worth it
